name: DCHB::hits
info: reconstructed hits using DC wire positions

entries.name: trkDoca
entries.info: track doca of the hit (in cm)

entries.name: docaError
entries.info: error on track doca of the hit

entries.name: xLocal
entries.info: x in planar local coordinate system

entries.name: yLocal
entries.info: y in planar local coordinate system

entries.name: B
entries.info: B-field intensity at hit position in tilted-sector system

name: DCHB::clusters
info: reconstructed clusters using DC wire positions

name: DCHB::segments
info: reconstructed segments using DC wire positions

entries.name: SegEndPoint1X
entries.info: Segment 1st endpoint x coordinate in the sector coordinate system (for ced display)

entries.name: SegEndPoint1Z
entries.info: Segment 1st endpoint z coordinate in the sector coordinate system (for ced display)

entries.name: SegEndPoint2X
entries.info: Segment 2nd endpoint x coordinate in the sector coordinate system (for ced display)

entries.name: SegEndPoint2Z
entries.info: Segment 2nd endpoint z coordinate in the sector coordinate system (for ced display)

name: DCHB::segtrajectory
info: reconstructed segment trajectory from hit-based tracking

name: DCHB::crosses
info: reconstructed segments using DC wire positions

entries.name: x
entries.info: DC track cross x-coordinate (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: y
entries.info: DC track cross y-coordinate (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: z
entries.info: DC track cross z-coordinate (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: xError
entries.info: DC track cross x-coordinate uncertainty (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: yError
entries.info: DC track cross y-coordinate uncertainty (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: zError
entries.info: DC track cross z-coordinate uncertainty (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: xUnitDir
entries.info: DC track cross x-direction (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: yUnitDir
entries.info: DC track cross y-direction (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: zUnitDir
entries.info: DC track cross z-direction (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: xUnitDirErr
entries.info: DC track cross x-direction uncertainty (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: yUnitDirErr
entries.info: DC track cross y-direction uncertainty (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: zUnitDirErr
entries.info: DC track cross z-direction uncertainty (in the DC tilted sector coordinate system)

entries.name: Segment1_ID
entries.info: id of first superlater used in segment

entries.name: Segment2_ID
entries.info: id of second superlater used in segment

entries.name: zCrossReg1UnitDir

entries.name: yVtx

entries.name: zVtx
entries.info: Vertex z-position of the swam track to the DOCA to the beamline (in cm)

entries.name: px
entries.info: 3-momentum x-coordinate of the swam track to the DOCA to the beamline (in cm)

entries.name: py

entries.name: pz

entries.name: xStateVec
entries.info: last site stateVec in tilted sector x (in cm)

entries.info: last site stateVec in tilted sector y (in cm)

entries.info: last site stateVec in tilted sector z (in cm)

entries.info: last site stateVec in tilted sector tx (px/pz)

entries.info: last site stateVec in tilted sector ty (py/pz)

name: DCTB::hits
info: reconstructed hits using DC timing information

entries.name: doca
entries.info: doca of the hit calculated from TDC (in cm)

entries.name: docaError
entries.info: uncertainty on doca of the hit calculated from TDC (in cm)

entries.name: trkDoca
entries.info: track doca of the hit (in cm)

entries.name: timeResidual
entries.info: time residual of the hit (in cm)

entries.name: fitResidual
entries.info: fit residual of the hit (in cm, from KF)

entries.name: B
entries.info: B-field intensity at hit position in tilted-sector system

entries.name: tBeta
entries.info: beta-dependent time correction used in tracking
